Title: Removes the national rifle association from the list of entities authorized to grant certificates as instructors in small arms practice
Summary: Removes the national rifle association from the list of entities authorized to grant certificates as instructors in small arms practice.
LawCode: Amd ยง265.00, Pen L; amd ยง837, Exec L (as proposed in S.51001 & A.41001)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the executive law, in relation to removing the national rifle association from the list of entities authorized to grant certificates as instructors in small arms practice
